content: Credit Card OCBC Miles Shopping Lifestyle Asked by AnonymousAsked on 25 Aug 2019How does the new OCBC 90°N credit card foreign fees work?Hi there, I am considering to get the OCBC 90°N card for miles, saw that foreign charges are 3%?My calculation of value for the miles:(E.g.
